markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Marine Ally](/Feats.aspx?ID=2303) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've befriended a sea creature, which becomes magically bonded to you. You gain a [familiar](/familiar-abilities). The type of creature is up to you, but one of its abilities must always be a swim Speed or the [amphibious](/Familiars.aspx?ID=1) familiar ability.
name: Marine Ally

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Marine Ally Source Ancestry Guide pg. 14 2.0 --- You've befriended a sea creature, which becomes magically bonded to you. You gain a familiar. The type of creature is up to you, but one of its abilities must always be a swim Speed or the amphibious familiar ability.
